4_14TDWFVHuTXNcg8pp6LRr7v9ZcfbFsMSyx.body:
Ported to Zeronet from [www.zenpen.io](http://www.zenpen.io/).

Toggle fullscreen, invert colours, and set target word count don't seem to work quite as advertised, but writing, formatting, and saving does. It's been minimally tested, so don't use it for anything important.

> [meidan](#comment_1_1LeqWgNKQHKdYdy8AREoHprsCEU6cPrTTC): I ported ZenPen too. I guess we had the same idea. :)

I hope yours works better than mine! ;)

(I have difficulties loading yours: znet finds 20 peers, but no content.json.)

1_1Jyezu6NPCtcQ5z8EKUjB9RencrKnCrCbZ.body:
That name doesn't resolve, and warez.bit doesn't have a Zeronet address.
Please try again.

2_1Jyezu6NPCtcQ5z8EKUjB9RencrKnCrCbZ.body:
The URL is either a typo or there's something you've misunderstood.
You can't just use an arbitrary name after the last slash and hope that people can find it. You will either have to register a .bit domain on the Namecoin blockchain and put that name in your zite's content.json file, or provide the full Bitcoin address of your zite.
